detaileddescription.para: function to use in order to create a new plugin interface permit to keep the ABI compatibility must be use in ALL the plugin's "gfal_plugin_init" functions

memberdef.argsstring: (GError **)
memberdef.name: gfal_get_cat_type

memberdef.argsstring: (gfal_handle, GError **err)

detaileddescription.para: Instance all plugins for use if it's not the case return the number of plugin available

detaileddescription.para: external function to get the list of the plugins loaded

memberdef.argsstring: (gfal_handle, GError **err)

detaileddescription.para: Delete all instance of plugins

memberdef.argsstring: (gfal_handle handle, const char *path, int mode, GError **err)
memberdef.name: gfal_plugins_accessG

detaileddescription.para:
Execute an access function on the first plugin compatible in the plugin list return the result of the first valid plugin for a given URL
result of the access method or -1 if error and set GError with the correct value error : EPROTONOSUPPORT means that the URL is not matched by a plugin

memberdef.argsstring: (gfal_handle handle, const char *path, GError **err)
memberdef.name: gfal_plugin_rmdirG

detaileddescription.para:
Execute a rmdir function on the first compatible plugin ( checked with check url func )
handle
handle of the current context
path
path to delete
GError
error report system
no check on the path, please check the path before
return 0 if success else return -1

memberdef.argsstring: (gfal_handle handle, const char *path, char *buff, size_t buffsiz, GError **err)
memberdef.name: gfal_plugin_readlinkG

detaileddescription.para: Execute a readlink function

memberdef.name: gfal_plugin_chmodG

detaileddescription.para:
Execute the chmod function on the first compatible plugin ( checked with check_url func )
0 if success or -1 and set the GError to the correct errno value with a description msg

memberdef.argsstring: (gfal_handle handle, const char *path, mode_t mode, gboolean pflag, GError **err)
memberdef.name: gfal_plugin_mkdirp

detaileddescription.para:
Execute a mkdir function on the first compatible plugin ( checked with check url func )
handle
handle of the current context
path
path to create
mode
right of the file created
pflag
if TRUE, execute the request recursively if necessary else work as the common mkdir system call
GError
error report system
no check on the path, please check the path before
return 0 if success else return -1

memberdef.argsstring: (gfal_handle handle, const char *name, GError **err)

detaileddescription.para:
Execute a opendir function on the first compatible plugin ( checked with check url func )
handle
handle of the current context
path
path to open
GError
error report system
gfal_file_handle pointer given to the handle or NULL if error

do a write operation on the plugin, write s_buff chars on the fd device
return number of bytes readed else -1 if errors and GError is set

return number of bytes readed else -1 if errors and GError is set

return number of bytes readed else -1 if errors and GError is set

detaileddescription.para:
Check if a parameter key is used by a plugin or not
0 if used else -1 -> not used, set GError only if major error occures

memberdef.argsstring: (gfal_handle handle, const char *namespace, const char *key, GError **err)
memberdef.name: gfal_plugins_notify_all

detaileddescription.para: Notify all the plugins of a change on a given parameter plugins must ignore and return 0 if this key is not used, or if it is a correct change they must return -1 and GError if an error occures with the new value

briefdescription.para: the header file of the common lib for the plugin management
